question: [Practice] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (59, 114), (172, 144), (144, 48).

qas.question: [Practice] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (59, 114), (172, 144), (144, 48).
[Review] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (59, 114), (172, 144), (144, 48). Provide only the area.
[Study] Turkce: (59, 114), (172, 144), (144, 48) noktalarindan olusan ucgenin alanini ve cevresini hesapla. Provide only the perimeter.
